item.title: Making Hacking Accessible
item.description: I hate the current state of hacking education, or of hacking tools. None of it is accessible to any minority. In this post, I aim to distil some guidelines for making hacking accessible. I am by no means an expert. I don’t even work in A11Y. However, I do have some wonderful friends that do — and I am passionate about this subject. Why We Need to Focus on Accessibility Basic human rights An expansion in the infosec community of new tools, new learning platforms, and new hackers SEO It is legally required.
